summary: This document is a bank statement for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of March 1, 2014, to March 31, 2014. It details account balances, withdrawals, and deposits, including a specific transaction to the North Carolina Secretary of Filings.

persons.name: Philip Fintchre
persons.context: Philip Fintchre is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account associated with Shocker Holdings LLC.

events.title: Withdrawal to NC Secretary of Filings
events.description: A withdrawal of $202.00 was made to the North Carolina Secretary of Filings.

keyFacts: The bank statement is for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of March 1, 2014, to March 31, 2014.
The ending balance for the account on March 31, 2014, was $19,558.80.
A withdrawal of $202.00 was made to the North Carolina Secretary of Filings on March 3, 2014.
The document indicates that the standard monthly service charge was waived due to balance criteria being met.
The total combined monthly average balance across accounts was $19,283.12.
